CHA2DS2_VASC_FORMULAS: Risco Anual de AVC; Hipocoagulação; Pontuação CHA²DS²-VASc
CHA2DS2_VASC_ANUAL_STROKE_RISK_STUDY: Prevention of stroke in patients with atrial fibrillation: current strategies and future directions. British Medical Journal. Retrieved 30 December 2012.
CHA2DS2_VASC_MODERATE_RISK_SUGGESTION: A hipocoagulação oral deve de ser preferida.
CHA2DS2_VASC_SCORE_LEGEND: C - Congestive Heart Failure [+1]; H - Hypertension [+1]; A² - Age >= 75 years [+2]; D - Diabetes Mellitus [+1]; S² - Prior Stroke, TIA or Thromboembolism [+2]; V - Vascular Disease [+1]; A - 65-74 years [+1]; Sc - Sex category if female [+1]
CHA2DS2_VASC_CONGESTIVE_HEART_FAILURE_HI: Indique se o paciente sofre de Insuficiência Cardíaca ou FEVE < 40%.
CHA2DS2_VASC_HYPERTENSION_HISTORY_TXT: Indique se o paciente sofre de hipertensão arterial.
CHA2DS2_VASC_STROKE_OR_TIA_OR_THROMBOEMB: Indique se o paciente sofre de AVC, AIT ou Embolismo Sistémico
CHA2DS2_VASC_VASCULAR_DISEASE_HISTORY_TX: Indique se existe histórico de doença vascular (EAM, DAP...).
CHA2DS2_VASC_DIABETES_MELLITUS_TXT: Indique se o paciente sofre de Diabetes Mellitus.
